channel.title: Map Generator
channel.description: Plugin to fill a layer with a map generated from a location (Google Maps and Mapbox)

item.title: Version 1.0.4
item.description: • The plugin now supports the new mechanism for updating plugins within the app v1.0.4

item.title: Version 1.0.5
item.description: • Now you can save the address, zoom, map type and the Snazzy styles to use them later v1.0.5

item.title: Version 2.0.0
item.description: • Now you can generate a map using Google Maps or Mapbox! v2.0.0

item.title: Version 2.0.1
item.description: • Fix a low-level bug related to the dialog title v2.0.1

item.title: Version 2.0.2
item.description: • The problem of maps that were not shown due to changes in Sketch version 47 has been solved v2.0.2
